name: Brighter Day
description: Probably the most colorful horror game you've ever played. Hide from moaning disembodied eyeballs while facing existential dread, ambient music, and alternative medicine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Graphics: DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 450 MB available space

reviews.review_text: the children cry when the sun is high  and i cry because i cant beat the game.  10/10 would buy again.

A great game that prooves that game design trumps realism in horror just like other game genres, I feel as if you get so much more than a 3 dollar experience, adn I would have gladly paid 10 dollars for this game if it were that price.

I can tell you why this is the best game ever created. You can collect drugs,u can throw drugs to distract big eye balls,there is funny music following u around. This game is not scary. Unless u got scopophobia,then just dont play this game. Trust me. Iam not lying to u.
